result.name: Gladys' Estate Coffee

reviews.text: Yummy coffee! Love their ice latte. It’s cold and contains no ice thus retains the flavour. Best coffee in the whole of Kowloon in my opinion.
One of the best coffees (if not the best) in Hong Kong.  The tiramisu is also fantastic. Cash only.
Really good coffee, lovely food. Friendly service, 10/10 would recommend.
Barista of this cafe makes coffee wholeheartedly.  A small place but is worth to revisit.
Comfort place to take a coffee break.

result.adr_address: 15號D, 6-8 Lion Rock Rd, Kowloon City, 香港
result.formatted_address: 15號D, 6-8 Lion Rock Rd, Kowloon City, 香港
result.name: Gladys' Estate Coffee

reviews.text: 好飲精品咖啡店🖒
Yummy coffee! Love their ice latte. It’s cold and contains no ice thus retains the flavour. Best coffee in the whole of Kowloon in my opinion.

2018.12.21

Colombia @ Gladys' Estate Coffee

聽說老闆好有性格，
餐牌寫明 "Sorry! No sugar serve for all Coffee" ~~

最喜歡有性格的咖啡師，
有要求，出品不會差。

"想要手沖。"
"在那邊，自己選，可以打開來聞。"

牆上木架兩層，
放了約十包豆，
不同牌子/大小/包裝。

好事，
對客人來說，選擇夠多，
還表示咖啡師有信心駕馭各種類型。

選了豆，
"這不是 single。" 老闆一看就說。
"OK。"

老闆調了一下磨豆機，
磨好，給我聞乾粉味，
味道清澈，
顆粒較粗。

不用溫度計，直接注水。

悶蒸，從後面拿出小玻璃杯，
倒轉，放到濾杯裡，完全覆蓋"漢堡"！
第一次見識這手法。

牆上黑板寫著沖煮好咖啡要點，
其中一項是：pressure。
小杯就是 pressure 吧~

第一口，好甜~
乾淨，沒有什麼雜味，
尾段微酸，淡淡作結。

有性格，不一定趕客。
平日下午，老闆對來客一一熱絡打招呼，
唸得出姓氏/名字，都是熟客。

[Finca San Isidro, COLOMBIA by MONMOUTH COFFEE COMPANY]

九龍城獅子石道8號

#九龍城咖啡店
#香港咖啡店
#哥倫比亞咖啡
#咖啡
One of the best coffees (if not the best) in Hong Kong.  The tiramisu is also fantastic. Cash only.
Really good coffee, lovely food. Friendly service, 10/10 would recommend.
